Innkeeper - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.charactercards
Allows the player to call a special version of the profCheck method, which reassigns the professor even if the current player has the same amount of students of the same color of the current owner of the professor.

islandConquerCheck(Player, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameBoard
Checks: 1) if there's a veto tiles on the selected island (if there is one, it is removed and nothing else is done) - Expert mode exclusive. 2) if the owner of the selected island is different from the current player.
